alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:20PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN CARLTON COUNTY THROUGH 245 PM CDT... At 220 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, or 9 miles southwest of Cloquet, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area around 225 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cloquet, Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area and Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
